manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LOMA Pillars Pure Clean Water Infused with Aloe Naturally based, green chemistry: moisturize, enhance, protect, restore and repair the hair. We infuse the purest water with concentrated organic aloe vera powder - this powerful combination creates the #1 ingredient in Loma products. Aloemoist Complex is made of pure organic plant extracts, oils, vitamins and minerals and offers a simple and clean approach to healthy hair and a sustainable environment. Clean Ingredients, Natural Fragrances Paraben, Sodium Chloride, Gluten, and Soy Free. Sulfate-free Cleansing. “LOMATherapy” consists of Essential Oil-Based Fragrances, Natural Aroma Ingredients & Aromatic Botanical Extracts Vegan-Friendly* NEVER tested on animals and Vegan Friendly (*We utilize a small amount of beeswax in our Fiber Putty and Forming Paste, which we obtain in a way that does not harm the bees. All of our other products are totally vegan, using no animal bi-products.)

Violet Shampoo & Conditioner Daily Shampoo & Conditioner Moisturizing Shampoo & Treatment Nourishing Shampoo & Conditioner Gluten Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Soy Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Sulfate Free Cleansing ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Key Benefit Brightens grey and blonde hair For all hair types Restores moisture for silky, shiny hair For dry, thirsty and chemically treated hair Aromatherapy Shampoo = Vanilla Bean & Blood Orange. Conditioner = Lemon and Eucalyptus Tangerine, Orange and Grapefruit Shampoo = Mango, Orange and Tangerine. Conditioner = Vanilla Bean and Orange Cranberry and Pear Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Sodium Chloride Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Love love the way it smells and the the way it makes my hair feel. My husband loves the way my hair smells:) I have dry damaged hair from bleaching and after using this shampoo my hair feels healthy, shiny, and soft. I also use LOMA conditioner, and I love how these two products make my hair feel and look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality
reviews.reviewText: My hair stylist got me hooked on this shampoo years ago. At that time I don't think they were well known, and they are local to where I live. I have very curly hair and now I have straight hair after having a Brazilian blowout. In my experience this shampoo and conditioner have made the blowout last way beyond my wildest dream. Same shampoo was always good with curly hair too. It smells wonderful and you don't have to use much to wash your hair. I have very thick hair which is about elbow length. It may seem expensive, but it lasts and lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My absolute favorite shampoo!I ordered it in the morning and had it by the afternoon!Best price and best service !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best shampoo and conditioner ever!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE Loma! I am almost 49 years old, and up until 6 years ago, I couldn’t find a shampoo and conditioner that would continue to work for more than like a week. I have baby fine hair, and it’s been a battle my entire life. I moved to a different city and acquired a new hair dresser that used it. I liked it so I bought it. I haven’t used anything else since! It does great on my hair, and I have to wash my hair daily. The Nourishing and the Moisturizing ones are what I use. I also use the hairspray, leave in conditioner, the volumizer gel, and the oil. Even the oil isn’t too heavy for my hair. It’s like this line was made for people with hair like mine! They better not ever discontinue it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great with dyed hair
reviews.reviewText: Great with dyed hair won’t strip off color.The only thing I don’t like is when hair is wet it feels a little hard but once its dry it’s soft and shiny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use it always
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! So much better for my hair with it's natural products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for curly hair.
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying this shampoo from Amazon for awhile now and thankfully have had no issues. I have long curly hair and I am Hispanic. This combo makes for unruly hair. Loma really helps with this because it gives it moisture without making your hair oily. Oiliness has been an issue for me when trying to get moisture into my hair. Loma has a very light smell that I can only smell when I am using it but I have been told by others they can smell it. Another good thing is how thick it is. Because of this, you don't need to use too much, making it a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Shampoo, however...
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is great - I can feel my scalp and hair is healthier and it is very moistrurizing.However, the bottle is very difficult to use. Despite being a very large bottle, there is no pump or easy place for gripping. Also, the scent is not the best.
I love this product. My hair was dry and needed attention, with one wash, my hair feels amazing, as if it was never dried ever! Spend the money, this is a keeper!
I love the texture and smell of this shampoo. It makes my hair feel moisterized and clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: My wife swear by this. She has used it for years.
reviews.reviewText: She says it really help her hair staying normal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great shampoo for my blonde locks
reviews.reviewText: I like the shampoo a lot
The wife uses it for colour treated & bleached hair. Keeps it looking fabulous. I even use it on my beard. Best deal we’ve found so far as well. Will buy again.
